channel.title: Could you add multi language support
channel.description:
Really like your product and we have been use for couple of month. Now we are facing a problem, have to show dashboards to a group of people who are not used to English interface...
So could you have multi-language support, such as add Chinese, Japanese, Spanish...etc
Thanks.

item.title: Could you add multi language support
item.dc:creator: shivani29
item.description:
Can someone please help me with making the Redash dashboard bilingual ?

Read full topic

item.title: Could you add multi language support
item.dc:creator: arikfr
item.description:
It’s actually pending on the frontend rewrite, but it’s indeed on our mind and we hope to work towards being able to support I18n as soon as possible

Read full topic
item.source: Could you add multi language support

item.title: Could you add multi language support
item.dc:creator: extrobe
item.description:
There is an open feature request for localisation of redash. I gather it’s pending some backend changes to support this.

Internationalize Redash Development
I’ll be happy to start a discussion on how we can introduce translations support into the codebase to facilitate this. Ideally it should be done in a way that the translations files are portable in case we switch from Angular.js at some point. Quick googling brought up angular-translate, but if some who has prior experience can share more details it will be great. cc: @levko

Read full topic
item.source: Could you add multi language support
